examples.translation: 要照出清晰的照片，就要把焦点对准物体。
examples.last: if you want a sharp photograph.

examples.translation: 大家的眼光都注意着他。
你应该把注意力放到工作上。

v: cause to converge on or toward a central point
bring into focus or alignment; to converge or cause to converge; of ideas or emotions
n: the concentration of attention or energy on something
maximum clarity or distinctness of an image rendered by an optical system
maximum clarity or distinctness of an idea

v: 集中, 聚集, 使集中
